A4.text: Cora was rehired as the Red Sox' manager on November 6, 2020, on a two-year contract for the 2021 and 2022 seasons, with a club option for the 2023 and 2024 seasons.

A5.text: On November 22, 2021, the Red Sox announced that they exercised their 2023â€“2024 option, and in 2024, Cora agreed to a three-year contract extension through the 2027 season.
